${ModID}:SchemePower.NAME: Scheme
DESCRIPTIONS: cards played this turn that cost #b1 or less will be played twice.
The next card played this turn that costs #b1 or less will be played twice.

${ModID}:SchemeNextTurnPower.NAME: Plotting Scheme
DESCRIPTIONS: cards that cost #b1 or less will be played twice.
Next turn, the first card that costs #b1 or less will be played twice.

${ModID}:TomeOfIntellectPower.NAME: Tome of Intellect
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, shuffle #b
